# Rebrand the term 'Wiki' to 'Workspace' in the menu of a workspace. To be used by the workspace template and in all created workspaces. core.menu.type.wiki=Workspace core.menu.watchlist.add.wiki=Watch Workspace core.menu.watchlist.remove.wiki=Unwatch Workspace core.menu.admin.wiki=Administer Workspace
